name: pgAdmin
description: pgAdmin is a feature-rich open source administration and development platform for PostgreSQL.

parameters.name: Environment Variables
parameters.description:
Environment variables in key=value format, one per line. Each line sets an environment variable in the container configuration. Example:
MYAPP_HOST=localhost
MYAPP_PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb
parameters.default:
PGADMIN_CONFIG_MASTER_PASSWORD_REQUIRED=False
PGADMIN_CONFIG_SERVER_MODE=True
PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=admin@local.dev
PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD={{ PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD }}
PGADMIN_EMAIL=admin@local.dev
PGADMIN_PORT=5050
PGADMIN_VERSION=latest
